description: Historical data based on Export Tool dump

targets.expr: hv_ldev_read_iops{storagetype="$Type", storagename="$System", p_id="000", type="DP", ldev="$LDEV"} / (hv_ldev_read_iops{storagetype="$Type", storagename="$System", p_id="000", type="DP", ldev="$LDEV"} + hv_ldev_write_iops{storagetype="$Type", storagename="$System", p_id="000", type="DP", ldev="$LDEV"})

hv_ldev_write_iops{storagetype="$Type", storagename="$System", p_id="000", type="DP", ldev="$LDEV"} / (hv_ldev_read_iops{storagetype="$Type", storagename="$System", p_id="000", type="DP", ldev="$LDEV"} + hv_ldev_write_iops{storagetype="$Type", storagename="$System", p_id="000", type="DP", ldev="$LDEV"})

panels.title: Read & Write Ration on IOPS for $LDEV
Read / Write IO Ratio for LDEV $LDEV

targets.expr: hv_ldev_read_transfer{storagetype="$Type", storagename="$System", p_id="000", type="DP", ldev="$LDEV"} / (hv_ldev_read_transfer{storagetype="$Type", storagename="$System", p_id="000", type="DP", ldev="$LDEV"} + hv_ldev_write_transfer{storagetype="$Type", storagename="$System", p_id="000", type="DP", ldev="$LDEV"})

hv_ldev_write_transfer{storagetype="$Type", storagename="$System", p_id="000", type="DP", ldev="$LDEV"} / (hv_ldev_read_transfer{storagetype="$Type", storagename="$System", p_id="000", type="DP", ldev="$LDEV"} + hv_ldev_write_transfer{storagetype="$Type", storagename="$System", p_id="000", type="DP", ldev="$LDEV"})

panels.title: Read & Write Ration on Throughput for $LDEV
Read / Write Throughput Ratio for LDEV $LDEV
Random & Sequential IOPS Ratio for LDEV $LDEV
Random & Sequential Read IOPS for LDEV $LDEV
Random & Sequential Read IOPS Ratio for LDEV $LDEV
Random & Sequential Write IOPS for LDEV $LDEV
Random & Sequential Read IOPS Ratio for LDEV $LDEV

title: HV: Historical LDEV Details
